Best Server Game to test your Speed, Accuracy, Strategy and Decision Making Skills.

"Your matchmaking experience will be significantly affected because your Trust Factor is substantially lower than the mariane dig. CS:GO's matchmaking will prioritize finding opponents with a similar substantially lower Trust Factor."

A fun experience!

I feel like the matchmaking is really unbalanced, there is always a number one on both sides of the team that just carries the whole game, and always one bottom fragger with maybe 6-7 kills at the end of the game.
What i'm saying is that there is a giant skill gap in just the ranks.

Other then that it's a great game, there is a really big learning curve and it's worth the time and effort to learn this game.
